product_name: Outdoor Research Sensor Gloves - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for winter, the wind-resistant, 100-weight fleece Outdoor Research Sensor Gloves for men have touch-screen-compatible leather palms so you can operate your device without removing your gloves. Double-layer fleece is warm, breathable, lightweight, moisture-wicking and quick-drying; ToughTec(TM) leather palms can operate a touch-screen. Real leather TouchTec is soft and tactile; the gloves are built with minimal seams for a low-bulk, comfortable, snug fit. Outdoor Research Sensor Gloves for men have contoured wrists and glove clips that connect them for easy tracking. Closeout.
